column4: Dapper Installation help needed. Fresh install Dapper 6.06.1, SATA 250GB disk. CD starts to boot then hangs on Uncompressing linux... OK, booting Kernel.
NullV: I burned another. Same thing.
Does it get to the start/install screen?
try F6 there and one of these  Grub Boot Options ide=nodma vga=normal nomce acpi=off pnpbios=off xdrvr=vesa xres=800x600 apm=off
